js.name: main.js
js.desc: The main JS file. This is used on all pages of the website.

js.name: index.js
js.desc: The Index Script. This is used to create the typing animation.

js.name: projects.js
js.desc: The Projects Script. This is used to create the typing animation on the projects page.

js.name: assets.js
js.desc: The Assets Script. This is used to create the typing animation on the assets page, aswell as loading the assets.json file.

css.name: main.css
css.desc: The main CSS file. This is used on all pages of the website.

css.name: roboto.css
css.desc: The Roboto Font CSS file. This is used to load the Roboto font from Google Fonts.

css.name: debug.css
css.desc: The Debug CSS file. This is used to style the page in a way that allows us to debug the formatting.

other.name: assets.json
other.desc: The Assets JSON file. This is used to load the assets on the assets page.

other.name: README.md
other.desc: The README file. This is used on my Github, but you'll be able to see it here.
